message.body: Hey - I forgot about umai on #### st- are u okay with eating there instead?
Yes if you don't mind calling them for a reservation. That place is really small
I can't call right now unfortunately
Got it - 7:15 - my friend ### is joining and he is bringing this ###### guy that his mother is sort of watching - long story
You know I kind of suck at taking to people I don't know, right? Just so everyone is forewarned
I will try to explain - too much for text - see u in a bit!!
### is sooooo easy to talk to and the frnch kid is kinda miserable at moment and English not so great so he doesn't matter anyway - so - ur actually all good at this dinner tonight!
Ha ha. Okay, see you in a bit
